00007 #include "zip.h"
00008 #include "settings.h"
00009 
00010 #include <QFileInfo>
00011 #include <QDebug>
00012 #include <zzip/lib.h>
00013 #include <math.h>
00014 
00015 
00016 
00022 int SrtmZipFile::getData(QString filename, qint16 **buffer)
00023 {
00024     *buffer = 0;
00025     
00026     QFileInfo fi(filename);
00027     QString uncompressedFile = fi.path()+'/'+fi.completeBaseName();
00028 
00029     int size = 0;
00030     if (QFileInfo(uncompressedFile).exists()) {
00031         QFile file(uncompressedFile);
00032         if (!file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) {
00033             qCritical() << "ZIP(Uncompressed): Could not open file" << uncompressedFile << file.errorString();
00034             return 0;
00035         }
00036         size = sqrt(file.size()/2);
00037         if (size*size*2 != file.size()) {
00038             qCritical() << "ZIP(Uncompressed): Invalid data: Not a square!";
00039         }
00040         *buffer = new qint16[file.size()/2];
00041         if (!*buffer) {
00042             qCritical() << "ZIP(Uncompressed): Could not allocate buffer.";
00043             return 0;
00044         }
00045         if (file.read((char *)*buffer, file.size()) != file.size()) {
00046             qCritical() << "ZIP(Uncompressed): Could not read all bytes.";
00047         }
00048         file.close();
00049     } else {
00050         ZZIP_DIR* dir = zzip_dir_open(filename.toAscii(), 0);
00051         if (!dir) {
00052             qCritical() << "ZIP: Could not open zip file" << filename;
00053             return 0;
00054         }
00055         ZZIP_FILE* fp = zzip_file_open(dir, fi.completeBaseName().toAscii(), 0);
00056         if (!fp) {
00057             qCritical() << "ZIP: Could not find" <<  fi.completeBaseName() << "in" << filename;
00058             return 0;
00059         }
00060         ZZIP_STAT stat;
00061         if (zzip_file_stat(fp, &stat) == -1) {
00062             qCritical() << "ZIP: Could not get info about" << uncompressedFile;
00063             return 0;
00064         }
00065         
00066         size = sqrt(stat.st_size/2);
00067         if (size*size*2 != stat.st_size) {
00068             qCritical() << "ZIP: Invalid data: Not a square!";
00069         }
00070         *buffer = new qint16[stat.st_size/2];
00071 
00072         if (zzip_file_read(fp, *buffer, stat.st_size) != stat.st_size) {
00073             qCritical() << "ZIP: Could not read all bytes.";
00074             delete *buffer;
00075             *buffer = 0;
00076             return 0;
00077         }
00078 
00079         if (global_settings.getStoreUncompressed()) {
00080             QFile file(uncompressedFile);
00081             if (!file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly | QIODevice::Truncate)) {
00082                 qCritical() << "ZIP(Writing): Could not open file" << uncompressedFile << file.errorString();
00083             } else {
00084                 file.write((char *)*buffer, stat.st_size);
00085                 file.close();
00086             }
00087         }
00088         zzip_file_close(fp);
00089         zzip_dir_close(dir);
00090     }
00091     return size;
00092 }
